Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
IncludeInMobile_Description: If true, the module is used in mobile version of the interface
ExtensionsToView_Description: List of file types which can only be viewed by OnlyOffice
ExtensionsToConvert_Description: List of file types which can only be edited by OnlyOffice into a different format, and target format specified for each entry
ExtensionsToEdit_Description: List of file types which can be edited by OnlyOffice
Secret_Description: Secret token needs to be specified here if JWT protection is enabled on OnlyOffice
EnableHistory_Description: Enables Version History feature of document editing
